command.name: login
command.description: Login to The Library by entering username and password. Will do nothing if used while already logged in.

command.name: logout
command.description: Logout current user. You will be sent back to starting screen.

command.name: books all
command.description: Lists all books available in The Library right now.

command.name: books find <property> <keyword>
command.description: Search for books by a keyword in a selected property.

command.name: books sort <property> [asc|desc]
command.description: Sort books by a specified property. By default results are sorted in ascending order

command.name: books view <isbn_value>
command.description: View Details for a book with specific ISBN.

command.name: books add
command.description: Displays a form to enter the new book's details. Only users with admin rights can do this.

command.name: books remove <isbn_value>
command.description: Removes an existing book from The Library. Only users with admin rights can do this.

command.name: users add <username> <password>
command.description: Adds a new user to The Library. Full credentials are required. Only users with admin rights can do this.

command.name: users remove <username>
command.description: Removes an existing user from The Library. Only users with admin rights can do this.
